name: SNOW SKATER
description:
Controls

a/d - steer

q/e - tricks 

space - jump / grind

esc - pause

snow boarding time trial game the player tries to go through all the checkpoints as fast as possible. This game also include a free_ride mode were the player can explore the mountain preforming jumps and tricks along the way.  In this game the players feet are not strapped to the board so the player is able to preform skateboarding tricks.

this was a game jam game for the 32 bit 2021 jam, this game was inspired by tony Hawks pro skater and steep. Any Feedback on ways to improve this project would be greatly appreciated.
